TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection

summary.span: Represents the collection of extensibility elements used by the XML Web service.

span.span: Represents the collection of extensibility elements used by the XML Web service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合可以包含衍生自類別的執行個體，或執行個體類別。This collection can either contain instances of classes deriving from , or instances of the class. 在衍生類別中，類別可讓使用者定義除了 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 規格中定義的擴充性項目。In a derived class, class allows users to define extensibility elements in addition to those defined in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specification. 在中使用這些程式如果您事先知道您想要的擴充性項目的型別。Use these in your if you know in advance the type of extensibility element you want to make. 使用時您不知道項目的格式事先。Use an when you do not know the format of an element in advance. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CPP/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CS/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/VB/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自的類別中的許多命名空間公開`Extensions`屬性代表，建構函式會指派對應到 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 階層內的層級的父物件，目前`ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection`巢狀。Since many of the classes in the namespace expose an `Extensions` property representing a , the constructor assigns a parent object corresponding to the level within the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) hierarchy where the current `ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection` is nested. 如需有關 WSDL 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CPP/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CS/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/VB/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已經在集合中的項目數等於集合的容量，容量加倍插入新項目之前，會自動重新配置內部的陣列。If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果`index`參數等於、`extension`參數加入至結尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `extension` parameter is added to the end of the . 向下移動以容納新項目插入點後的項目。The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CPP/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/CS/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.cs#13)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension_13/VB/servicedescriptionformatextension_13.vb#13)]
